name: Creatures of Ava: WDC Charity Backpack Trinkets Set
summary: Want to help save wildlife on our planet as well? Buy this DLC to support an organization that helps endangered species. 11 bit studios will donate 81% of Net Receipts from sales of this DLC to WDC, Whale and Dolphin Conservation. WDC is a UK registered charity (no. 1014705).
